## Initial Data Loading and Checks 

```{r include = FALSE}

library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(ggplot2)
library(sjPlot)
library(tidyverse)
library(tinytex)
library(wordcountaddin)

# Load data 
crt_data = read.csv("https://andygolightly.github.io/teaching/MATH43515/CRT.csv", header = TRUE)

```

```{r}

# Check for NAs 
colSums(is.na(crt_data))

```
